movie.title: COVID-19: The System
movie.description_intro: COVID-19 "THE SYSTEM" The whole world is in Lock Down. There is panic in society. What is going on? After the Prime Minister's speech about the highly contagious "Corona" virus, Nico Sloot, an international entrepreneur, joined forces with scientists, doctors, and experts to find answers to the questions surrounding the coronavirus. How dangerous is this virus? What does our future look like? Are the current measures in proportion to the virus? And what impact does this have on our society? During Nico's quest, he makes shocking findings. - Is this actually about our public health?
movie.description_full: COVID-19 "THE SYSTEM" The whole world is in Lock Down. There is panic in society. What is going on? During Nico's quest, he makes shocking findings. - Is this actually about our public health?

movies.title: The Fresh Prince of Bel-Air Reunion
movies.title_english: The Fresh Prince of Bel-Air Reunion
movies.title_long: The Fresh Prince of Bel-Air Reunion (2020)
movies.summary: 30 years later, we're bringing the Banks family back together. Join Will Smith and his former co-stars for a funny and heartfelt night full of music and dancing in honor of the show that ran for six seasons and 148 episodes.
movies.description_full: 30 years later, we're bringing the Banks family back together. Join Will Smith and his former co-stars for a funny and heartfelt night full of music and dancing in honor of the show that ran for six seasons and 148 episodes.

movies.title: Beyond the Comfort Zone: 13 Countries to K2
movies.title_english: Beyond the Comfort Zone: 13 Countries to K2
movies.title_long: Beyond the Comfort Zone: 13 Countries to K2 (2018)
movies.summary: "The impossible only exists until we find a way to make it possible." Mike Horn is one of the most respected adventurers of the world. Together with his climbing partners, Fred Roux and Köbi Reichen, he travels through 13 countries in an attempt to get on top of the most difficult mountain in the world. Immersing into different cultures and breathtaking landscapes, the three explorers get closer to their dream of climbing K2.

movies.title: By the People: The Election of Barack Obama
movies.title_english: By the People: The Election of Barack Obama
movies.title_long: By the People: The Election of Barack Obama (2009)
movies.summary: In 2006, Barack Obama -- a largely unknown freshman senator from Illinois -- hits the campaign trail in a struggle to gain national recognition. Cameras follow Obama as he recovers from nearly losing to Sen. Hillary Clinton in the Democratic primaries and meets the challenge of his Republican rival, Sen. John McCain, in the general election. After a hard-fought campaign, Obama successfully captures the nation's imagination, becoming the first African-American president in U.S. history.
